page.title: 19TRADE IN SANDBACH
page.content: IN OUR BLOCK THERE ARE VERY FEW SHOPS- A POST-OFFICE ,A GENERAL STORE, A HARDWARE AND D.I.Y. SHOP AND AN OFF LICENCE. MOST PEOPLE DO THEIR{SHOPPING IN SANDBACH CENTRE.THERE,{TRADE}IS QUITE GOOD. RECENTLY A NEW{SHOPPING {PRECINT}HAS OPENED PROVIDING SANDBACH WITH A NEW SUPERMARKET AND SMALLER SHOPS AS WELL AS HELPING THE{ {UNEMPLOYMENT}PROBLEM.IN SANDBACH CENTRE THERE ARE 4 SUPERMARKETS,4 CHEMISTS,4 BUTCHERS,2 GREEN-GROCERS AND A SELECTION OF CLOTHES SHOPS. CHILDREN WOULD LIKE TO SEE A NEW TOY SHOP OPENING. THE ONLY TOY SHOP CLOSED LAST YEAR. MANY OF THE SMALL SHOPS WHICH USED TO BE OPEN IN OUR BLOCK HAVE HAD TO CLOSE BECAUSE OF THE COMPETITION FROM SANDBACH CENTRE. THE FACILITIES FOR SHOPPING IN SANDBACH ARE THOUGHT TO BE QUITE GOOD FOR THE SIZE OF THE TOWN.
